title: Key Concepts
content:
There are 5 key parts to getting a Vue 3 project to be server-side generated by Astro:

  1. Your server-rendering-ready Vue app
  2. An app.vue component to render the main app
  3. A head.vue component to render the Unhead JS content on the server
  4. A shared router.ts file that both the App and Head components can use to load the right component for the given route
  5. And Astro pages to specify which routes to render server-side.
